rally.1: 17 artists take part in this rally around VTubers
rally.2: After making a purchase (minimum 2‚Ç¨) from an artist, you can scan a QR code
rally.3: Once you've collected {{minimumStampsCount}} stamps, head over to Sedeto's stand to get a reward!
rally.4: As soon as your submission is validated, enter the draw to win a shikishi from Sedeto!
rally.5: You can replay as many times as you like!
rally.6: You can span your rally over several days during the convention!

contest.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered to the contest
contest.description: Join our big contest and get a chance to win a shikishi created by Sedeto!

requirements.noRally: Complete a rally to take part
requirements.oneMore: Complete another rally to take part

contest.title: Exclusive Contest

reward.disclaimer: Rewards are available while supplies last.

rally.description: Collect {{minimumStampsCount}} stamps to get one or more exclusive illustrated cards!
rally.title: Stamp Rally

reward.title: Rewards

rules.1: The rally will be completely digital and won't need any 4G, since you loaded it once. The access link will be there and on the booth.
rules.2: The rally features 17 booths. You'll need 10 stamps to complete your card. You'll need to visit the two halls (5 and 6) to complete your rally anyway, so prepare to walk!
rules.3: To get one stamp from a booth, you'll need to make purchases for 2‚Ç¨ or more on said booth.
rules.4: When you completed your rally card, you'll need to reach Sedeto's booth (Hall 6, Q652) to claim your reward. Ask Sedeto's team to validate your card on your smartphone and enter the raffle to draw your price.
rules.5: The main rewards are one of the exclusive postcards made by the featured artists of the rally, representing different popular vtubers, made like a signed original shikishi piece. There are 17 different postcards, you can chose the one you want! Each design will be in limited quantities everyday in order to give chance to everyone.
rules.6: You can win one, two or three of the exclusive postcards in the raffle!
rules.7: We'll draw another big prize at Sedeto's booth everyday at 4PM: One medium shikishi that Sedeto will draw for you with your oshi on it! You'll need to be there and to have validated a card the same day to get a chance to win.
rules.8: You can enter the rally several time to get more rewards!
rules.9: If we encounter any big issues, those rules may change in order to make it work at the best to be enjoyable and fair with everyone.
saveSubmissionQuestion: Do you want to save your submissions?

scanQRDrawer.description: Add a stamp in your collection by scanning the QR code showed to you by the artist!

submitNotAllowed: You have to scan at least {{stamps}} stamps.
submitTerms: This code is valid for the entire duration of the convention, you may get your reward at any day of the convention, if you want to try to get cards that are out-of-stock for the day.
